name: Sofie - child safe stuffed bunny
description:
Sofie is girly and fun loving.

Made of 100% Wool felt, cotton filling and cotton outfit. Hand stitched details. Sofie is soft and baby safe. All natural, no glue, no chemicals. Just like your little one.

Made to order, takes up to one week to complete order.

*also available in flannel cotton if allergy is an issue.

name: Wool cable cowl adult version - knit to order
description:
Chunky, soft and airy cowl in stylish cable. 

Knit to order. Takes up to one week to complete. 
Optional colors (see third picture)
Cream
Oat
Mocha
Platinum
Red

name: Wool cabled wrap/cowl
description:
One cowl, two styles. Chunky, soft and warm, in stylish cable.

Knit to order. Takes up to one week to complete.
Please select yarn choice and color and add into cart along with this order.

name: cozy-me-up wool wrist warmer - knit to order
description:
Ever wish your hands can be warm when reading a book, or just hanging out on a chilly day? These wrist warmer are perfect for busy hands that need some cozy love. 

XS fits wrist up to 3", fist up to 3 1/4" 
S fits wrist up to 3 1/4", fist up to 3 1/4"
M fits wrist up to 3 1/2", fist up to 3 3/4"
L fits wrist up to 4", fist up to 4 1/4" 

Comes in beautiful variegated, wintery and bold shades.
Please select choice yarn color, and specify desired size if above sizing does not fit your need.

Knit to order. Takes up to one week to complete.
Please select yarn choice and color and add into cart along with this order. Specify desired size if above sizing does not fit your need.

name: Oliver - child safe stuffed bunny
description:
Oliver is fun loving and super friendly. 

Made of 100% wool felt, cotton filling and cotton outfit. Hand stitched details. Oliver is soft and baby safe. All natural, no glue, no chemicals. Just like your little one.

Made to order, takes up to one week to complete order.

*also available in flannel cotton if allergy is an issue.
